metadata.title: CVE-2019-3574 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
In libsixel v1.8.2, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the functionload_jpeg() in the file loader.c, as demonstrated by img2sixel.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
